title: In case the owner/developer opts to utilize the FSI on the remainder plot/within layout, the permissibility of the FSI for the purpose of development on balance plot shall be considered on the gross plot area including excluding the area to be handed over to MCGM for IH
clause_text: In case the owner/developer opts to utilize the FSI on the remainder plot/within layout, the permissibility of the FSI for the purpose of development on balance plot shall be considered on the gross plot area including excluding the area to be handed over to MCGM for IH.
